tweets.text: For Ubuntu Community Appreciation Day, why not recommend an Ubuntu contributor with hashtag #UCAday - can't wait to see the entries!
It's Ubuntu Community Appreciation Day! Our chance to say thank you to all our contributors - we wouldn't be here without you #UCAday
RT @popey: Hurrah! #ubuntu phone over the air update number 8 is winging it's way to me now! https://t.co/ksSO0H1gJE
